helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.text: Our Help Center is your go-to resource for resolving any issues, understanding our services, and getting support 24/7.

addressStore.title: Store Location
addressStore.text: Visit our flagship location at 123 Food Lane, Culinary City. Open from 9am–9pm, Monday to Saturday.

privacyPolicy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacyPolicy.text: We are committed to safeguarding your privacy. Your personal data is encrypted and never shared without consent.

receivers.title: Receivers & Amplifiers
receivers.text: Our audio section features premium sound systems for kitchens, including Bluetooth amplifiers, smart speakers, and more.

ourStore.title: Explore Our Store
ourStore.text: Walk into a world of culinary wonders. From ingredients to appliances, our store has everything a food lover dreams of.

aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.text: We are a team of passionate foodies dedicated to bringing gourmet-level quality to your home, every single day.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.text: Before making a purchase or using our services, we recommend reviewing our updated terms to understand your rights.

returns.title: Easy Returns
returns.text: Didn't like the flavor or fit? Return it within 7 days. No forms, no drama—just email us.

wholesale.title: Wholesale Program
wholesale.text: Partner with us for bulk orders. Special pricing and logistics support for restaurants, offices, and events.

pagination.title: Smart Navigation
pagination.text: Use our intuitive menu filters and breadcrumbs to navigate across our wide range of products easily.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: Need to get in touch? Our team is here for you via phone, email, or live chat around the clock.

accessories.title: Kitchen Accessories
accessories.text: Explore our curated collection of chef knives, chopping boards, and innovative cooking tools.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.text: Review our user agreement outlining acceptable use, liability limits, and customer responsibilities.
